attributes.action: Relegate West Ham United Football Club from the Premiership
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Wet Ham United have dragged the name of football down. They cannot prove that they own Carlos Tevez registration. They have lied and cheated their way to stay in the Premiership and no one within the FA or Premier League have the guts to say they were wrong and should have deducted them points rather than a fine.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
